name: @doky/can-i-use-cookies
description: Can I use Cookies ? WordPress plugin

scripts.copy: mkdir -p build/ && copyfiles -u 1 "src/**/*" build/ -e "src/js/**/*" && copyfiles composer.json build/
scripts.apply-mustache: yarn run copy && node mustache.js | mustache - src/can-i-use-cookies.php > build/can-i-use-cookies.php
scripts.build: yarn run apply-mustache && wp-scripts build --config webpack.config.js
scripts.zip: yarn run build && mkdir -p dest && cd build && bestzip ../dest/can-i-use-cookies.zip .
scripts.publish: yarn run clean && yarn run zip && eval "$(cat .env)" && curl -v --user "$COMPOSER_CREDENTIALS" --upload-file ./dest/can-i-use-cookies.zip https://nexus.doky.fr/repository/composer-private/packages/upload/doky/can-i-use-cookies/$npm_package_version
